meanings.sent1: The ancient writing was indecipherable to the young archaeologist.
meanings.sent2: The doctor's handwriting was so indecipherable that no one could read it.
meanings.sent3: The cat's indecipherable behavior left everyone puzzled.
meanings.sent4: The map was an indecipherable maze of lines and symbols.
meanings.sent5: The teacher's explanation was as indecipherable as a secret code.

meanings.definition: Not able to be decoded or figured out.
meanings.sent1: The secret message was indecipherable without the key.
meanings.sent2: The encryption was so indecipherable that even experts struggled to crack it.
meanings.sent3: The indecipherable puzzle frustrated the players to no end.
meanings.sent4: Her emotions were an indecipherable mix of joy and sadness.
meanings.sent5: The mystery remained indecipherable despite hours of investigation.
